brokentTestExecuteUnpublished

public void brokentTestExecuteUnpublished()
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
This setup action will get called with an unpublished errata during the publish process. We need to test that nothing is added to the user's set, the relevant packages are set correctly, and that the returnvisit variable has been set.

brokenTestExecutePublished

public void brokenTestExecutePublished()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
This setup action will get called with a published errata from the channels edit tab that appears in the details nav for a published errata. We need to make sure that the users set gets initialized to the channels that are in the errata when the user first visits the page.

java.lang.Exception
